mapper.select: SELECT g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_name, g.id, g.goods_specification, g.goods_unit, p.member_price, p.retail_price, g.category_id, g.brand_id, g.type_id FROM app_customer c INNER JOIN goods_price p ON c.store_id = p.store_id INNER JOIN goods g ON p.goods_id = g.id INNER JOIN goods_category gc ON g.category_id = gc.id WHERE c.id = #{userId} AND gc.parent_code = #{categoryCode}
